contentSections.desc: Only pronouncing this word was difficult, not the process. Created using water colors and Adobe Photoshop.

contentSections.desc: The aleatoricistic piece created for this project using random splashes of water colors, scribbling with crayons and what not.
The original image of Quentin Tarantino used in this project. This image is the original work of their own author, couldn't find their name to credit.
